mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_PCR_CRS_CRT_PBI_SI( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, DOCUMENT_COUNT, ADDRESS_COUNT, JOB_COUNT, HISTORY_NAME_COUNT, DOCUMENT_ALERT_COUNT, QUERY_REPORT_COUNT, LAST_INFO_DATE, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{documentCount}, #{adressCount}, #{jobCount}, #{histroyNameCount}, #{documentAlertCount}, #{queryReportCount}, #{lastInfoDate}, #{appId} )
